Title: Cruel and Unusual Punishments
Plot: When Cudney threatens to spill the truth about Cyril's "wins", Ryan solicits Kosygin for help. He then schemes to have Kosygin and Stanislofsky eliminated and finally, tips off the hacks to get Hernandez and Ricardo busted. Busmalis gets a welcome visitor. Sister Pete's questions keep rising after sessions with Keller. Nappa continues working on his new project. Beecher asks Said for lessons in the Islamic faith.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, drug use & offensive language
GuestStars: Olek Krupa, William Cote, Sybil Walker, Austion Pendleton
